title: Honor 3.1 (3 1/3?.....3 1/4???.....3.25?????)
body:
Took 19 days. 

https://imgur.com/36hmdnI

Edit: ~~Oh man that image looks wonky. Please hold.~~
Edit: Aye!

replies.body: One 'bub' into honor 3?
Of course. Thanks, bub.
3 1/4 is the same as 3.25...
I think 3 1/4 makes more sense than any other way to call this. But yes, numerically they are equal.
3.25 is more acurat imo.

> [{quoted}](name=Timethief49,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=UarA3Hnd,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-22T19:37:58.575+0000)
>
> 3.25 is more acurat imo.

With spelling like that, who cares about accuracy?!
Since english isnt my native language, i prefer the language of numbers and symbols. You dont really need great grammar for organic chemistry ;)

Looks like [Tantram](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/UarA3Hnd-honor-31-3-133-14325?comment=0004) has solved our number nuisance. They shall henceforth be called "bubs."
So simple, so elegant. What a mad genius!

> [{quoted}](name=Timethief49,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=UarA3Hnd,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-22T22:49:10.352+0000)
>
> Since english isnt my native language, i prefer the language of numbers and symbols. You dont really need great grammar for organic chemistry ;)

Lol nice. I was just having a silly go at ya. No harm meant. Also congrats on knowing more than one language. I wish I did.
19 days, how many games?
82, give or take.
Very nice. Took me about 91 to get from 2.3 to 3.0, so that looks to be around the range of games required, assuming good behavior of course.
took me less than that.  Havent had time to play lately.  I'd say around 30-40.

I went from 2.3 to 3.0 in about 35. I don't play more than 10 games a week usually, but when I do, I try to make them count and I'd say out of those ~35 games I received honor in 25-30 games and 10-15 with more than one honor. I think it's more a percentage and when the system thinks there has been a reasonable sample size to upgrade you, but I could be wrong. I have been wrong before, and probably will be again.
Congratulations!

I started at honor level 2 checkpoint 3 this season
I'm level 118 and still honor level 2 , I get honored every match though
Damn.. I got that like 2 weeks ago and i don't even play all that much.
took me 2 fkn months
{{sticker:cass-cry}} That's a long time, but you made it :).
